text: HTd4 <7Tefu <TTHT Mfarut Trt Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 44 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (a 9a6;; 195 4ag7 #r roturff #7iq4) 2318 2468 2553 QTA: IExtn;: 2223 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #f-5 & 6, #42r-10, ETrRT, 7f forit-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-1O, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/21/2005-Admn June 30,2006 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE [124/2006] [Decision taken on Environment Division's file no. 11012/18/R&RIMisc /Policy] Sub:: Guidelines on implementation of the National  Policy on Resettlement and Rehabilitation (NPRR) ~reg: The Ministry of Rural Development (Department of Land Resources):_Goverment of India has notified the National Policy on Resettlement and Rehabilitation (NPRR) for project affected families-2003; which was Published in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary Part-4, Section 1, vide No- 46, dated February , 2004. Pursuant to notification of the NPRR; the Authority, in its 58th meeting held on 20.04.2008, has decided that henceforth in all NHDP project (except those projects where a specific R&R framework has been adopted) all "Titleholder Project Affected Families" will be paid an ex-gratia amount of Rs. 10,000/= For the purpose of this circular: "Project Affected Family" means a familylperson whose place of residence or other properties or source of livelihood are substantially affected by the process of acquisition Of iand for the project and who has been residing continuously for a period of not less than three years preceding the date of notification 0f the intent to acquire land for the project or practicing any trade, occupation or vocation continuously for a period 0f not less than three years in the aifected zone; preceding the date of notification Of the intent to acquire land: "family" means a Project Affected Family  consisting of such person, his or her spouse, minor sons, unmarried  daughters, minor brothers or  unmarried  sisters ,  father, mother and other members residing with him and dependent on him for their livelihood. The guidelines will be applicable in all projects where the process of land acquisition has just started, and the payment of compensation is still due. ah-% (S. K PANDEY) DGM (ADMN:) To 1.
